TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
granted but paradoxes happen

I wish for nothing therefore I am nothing

Granted, the multiverse is nothing

I wish to know the whole story

Granted. You forget all else.

I wish for a TARDIS

Granted. It's smaller on the inside than on the outside.

I wish for a Nintendo 3DS

(also good job guys, pony thread averted) COUGH COUGH WHAT DID YOU HEAR ME SAYING?

Oh noooooooooooo! You said it! You SAID it! don't you know what they said about saying "pony" when the bronies can hear?

Take your 3DS and GTFO :

I wish you take lesson of this, you thread derailer!

Granted. I will now derail more threads to annoy you.

I wish for a soul.

Granted, but I steal it (because I'm ginger)

I wish I wasn't thinking about deleting this post.

Granted

I wish people stopped adding K to every word to make it kerbal.

What, no corruption? (You can't corrupt me! I be ginger!) Shut up!

Granted. They now add a D to make it Dalek.

I wish for more boosdars.

Granted, but you can't use them.

I wish for Jeb to wipe that smirk off his face

granted we now have a JEB alike called Joe

I wish for cheesy fanfic link

Granted. It's a(n) r 34 Homestuck Fanfiction.

I wish for a better drawing tablet.

Granted. You get a FREAKING PIECE OF REAL PAPER.

I wish hologram keyboards existed

(They already do. They project lasers onto the table, and detect if your fingers are there or not.)

Granted. You stare at the projector and become blind.

I wish for Jool to be easier to aerobrake in.

Granted but Squad decreased the strength of parts so now your craft is falling and burning up in the Joolian atmosphere.

I wish i didn't suck at docking.

Granted, you suck at lanching now

I wish for a Lyra plushie

granted but it's not real

I wish for stuff

Granted. You recieve a completely random assortment of matter, consisting of strange shapes such as a collumn of Copper, a twisted husk made of potassium. A large part of the pile seems to be highly radioactive and another portion seems to be large quantities of chlorine gas. enjoy~

I wish for a meter tall column of silver with a radius of 2cm that was obtained legally and legitimately and only I know about its existence.

Granted, it's made from anti-matter

I wish to have pure spectra / spectrum in a little jar

Granted, it's a pure political spectra

I wish for the perfect rocket

Edited October 24, 2013 by Boosterspice

(I can haz fanfic link Aceassassin?)

Granted, Jeb flies it and purposely blows it up anyway

I wish I could have Pample's Plushie

Granted, It kills you in you sleep (damn, I want a plush of myself, even if I'm a psycho (narcism?))

I wish to be a sillicon-based life form

Granted, you cause yourself lung cancer

I wish for a picture of a dalek mutant on Derpy's head

It's already wierd, I don't need to do anything.

I wish for an assault Rainbow Dash

...granted.... but it is some how corrupted...

I wish for r85 pics...of ksp
